name: Yash Saxena

social_work: Innominds (NIET): Organized the GRAPHICS Event focused on image generation using AI, fostering creativity and technical skills among participants.

Cloud Shastra (NIET): Led initiatives to raise awareness about cloud solutions and security among students and faculty. Organized workshops, seminars, and interactive sessions to educate participants about cloud computing technologies.

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Security Guard Website Template
projects.description: Developed a website template for security guard companies to showcase their services and contact information. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.name: ODOP (One District One Product)
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive web application aimed at promoting and marketing unique products from each district of Jammu & Kashmir under the ODOP initiative. Implemented features to showcase product details, local artisans, and district-specific specialties, enhancing the visibility of regional products. Utilized modern web technologies including [list technologies used, e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js] for a responsive and user-friendly interface.

projects.name: Tourist Website With the help of Django
projects.description: Created a tourist website using the Django framework, allowing users to explore different tourist destinations, view attractions, and plan their trips. Integrated features such as user authentication and interactive maps.

projects.name: Currency Converter
projects.description: Designed and implemented a currency converter application using Python, allowing users to convert between different currencies based on the latest exchange rates.

projects.name: Count Down Timer
projects.description: Built a simple count down timer application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, allowing users to set custom countdowns for various events.
